item.text: He said to me, “Son of man, stand on your feet and I will speak with you.”
As he spoke to me, a wind came into me and stood me on my feet, and I heard the one speaking to me.
He said to me, “Son of man, I am sending you to the house of Israel, to rebellious nations who have rebelled against me; both they and their fathers have revolted against me to this very day.
The people to whom I am sending you are obstinate and hard-hearted, and you must say to them, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says.’

And as for <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="0518" class="">whether</st> they <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0518" class="">or</st> <st data-num="02308" class="">not</st>—<st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> are a <st data-num="04805" class="">rebellious</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st><n id="4" />—they will <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> a <st data-num="05030" class="">prophet</st> has <st data-num="01961" class="">been</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> them.

But <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st>, and do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">fear</st> their <st data-num="01697" class="">words</st>. <st data-num="03588" class="">Even though</st> <st data-num="05621" class="">briers</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05544" class="">thorns</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0854" class="">surround</st> you and <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">among</st> <st data-num="06137" class="">scorpions</st>—do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">fear</st> their <st data-num="01697" class="">words</st> and do <st data-num="0408" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="02865" class="">terrified</st> of the <st data-num="06440" class="">looks</st> they give you,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> are a <st data-num="04805" class="">rebellious</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st>!

You must <st data-num="01696" class="">speak</st> my <st data-num="01697" class="">words</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them <st data-num="0518" class="">whether</st> they <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st> <st data-num="0518" class="">or</st> <st data-num="02308" class="">not</st>, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> are <st data-num="04805" class="">rebellious</st>.
As for you, son of man, listen to what I am saying to you: Do not rebel like that rebellious house! Open your mouth and eat what I am giving you.”
Then I looked and realized a hand was stretched out to me, and in it was a written scroll.
He unrolled it before me, and it had writing on the front and back; written on it were laments, mourning, and woe.
